    • Uses of Response in com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp

      Methods in com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp that return Response 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response PDPEngine.decide(Request pepRequest)
      Evaluates the given Request using this PDPEngine's Policy Sets to determine if the given Request is allowed.

    • Uses of Response in com.att.research.xacml.api.pep

      Methods in com.att.research.xacml.api.pep that return Response 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response PEPEngine.decide(Request pepRequest)
      Instantiates a Policy Decision Point (PDP) to evaluate the given Request using its Policy Sets to determine if the given Request is allowed.

      Mutable implementation of the Response interface.

      Immutable implementation of the Response interface.
      Constructors in com.att.research.xacml.std with parameters of type Response 
      Constructor and Description
      StdMutableResponse(Response copy)
      Creates a new StdMutableResponse that is a copy of the given Response.
      StdResponse(Response response)
      Creates an immutable StdResponse wrapping the given Response.
